message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"girl (with erhua, a northern accent)","sentence":"女孩儿在笑。","image_prompt":"A young girl with a bright smile, wearing simple clothes, standing and smiling in a softly lit apocalyptic city landscape; everything is animated in a soft apocalypse animation style, with gentle colors and a hopeful mood, debris in the background but the girl is cheerful and lively.","sentence_translation":"The girl is smiling."}
